Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to CSS code.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileSystemOption
    Represents --file-system option.
    FileSystemOptionBuilder
    Responsible for creating new instances of FileSystemOption.
    FileSystemOptionsBuilder
    Responsible for creating value of the file system options.
    LessCompiler
    Less compiler compatible with Less 1.7.5.
    LessOptions
    Represents Less compiler options responsible for controlling the LessCompiler compilation process.
    LessOptionsBuilder
    Responsible for creating new instances of the LessOptions.
    LessVariableOption
    Represents global and modify variables.
    LessVariableOptionsBuilder
    Creates values of the global and modify variables options.
    NativeLessCompiler
    Native Less 1.7.5 compiler written in JavaScript by Less team and modified by Adam Gabry≈õ.
    NativeLessOptionsBuilder
    Responsible for creating options that control the NativeLessCompiler compilation process.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LineNumbersValue
    Available values of the line numbers option.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BuilderCreationException
    Thrown to indicate that an error occurred during build a new object.
    CompilerException
    Thrown to indicate that an error occurred during compilation process.
    ConfigurationException
    Thrown to indicate that a compiler has been configured incorrectly (example: missing required options).
    InitializationException
    Thrown to indicate that an error occurred during compiler initialization.
    ReadFileException
    Thrown to indicate that a compiler cannot read file content.
    SyntaxException
    Thrown to indicate that a syntax error occurred during source code compilation.

Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2 Description

The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to CSS code.
Since:
2.0.0
